item.description: Need a Girl's Night Out? Are you a woman in your 30s, 40s or 50+? Then this group is for you! Join us for dining out, dancing, drinks, murder mystery dinner parties, karaoke, shopping, or just out having a ball and doing whatever! The possibilities are endless... This is a great opportunity to get out, and meet new friends. "I want to be the one to walk in the sun . . . Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!"
item.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group
